content:
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/src/test/mir-opt/README.md Looking through this and trying to get it to emit dumps for my new test, but ./x.py test --stage 1 --bless src/test/mir-opt/simple_range_analysis.rs doesn't seem to work at all. The function being tested is commented based on the info in the readme and what it looks like in the other tests.
https://pybin.pw/Fh1L test code
Also this was posted in the wrong wg at first, my bad.
You also need a line like this in your test to tell the harness what to dump https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/d778203da2157f47af6d1f7ba5f44eb933ee2df1/src/test/mir-opt/address-of.rs#L1
